title: ‘Brennan’s crocodile tears over scorched Syria give hypocrisy a bad name’ – RT
text: Home Syria ‘Brennan’s crocodile tears over scorched Syria give hypocrisy a bad name’– RT ‘Brennan’s crocodile tears over scorched Syria give hypocrisy a bad name’– RT ‘Brennan’s crocodile tears over scorched Syria give hypocrisy a bad name’ RT Accusing Russia of practicing a “scorched-earth policy” in Syria is utterly hypocritical of CIA Director John Brennan who himself is largely responsible for nursing “moderate” rebels and plunging the country into chaos, former CIA officer Ray McGovern …
